properties.description: This is a data flow example of how to load facts into your fact table from a single sample Employee dimension. There is also an example of handling early-arriving facts.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		employeeID as string,
		Hours as string,
		Amount as string,
		ProjDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['SampleData/Facts/today/*.csv']) ~> Facts
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		surrogatekey as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		EmpFunction as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date,
		iscurrent as integer,
		processtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimEmployee
Facts derive(employeeID = toInteger(employeeID),
		iscurrent = 1,
		facttimestamp = currentTimestamp()) ~> SetAttributes
SetAttributes, DimEmployee lookup(employeeID == EmpID
	&& SetAttributes@iscurrent == DimEmployee@iscurrent,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimEmployee
CheckForEarlyFact aggregate(groupBy(ProjDate,
		employeeID),
	TotalHours = sum(toInteger(Hours)),
		TotalAmount = sum(toInteger(Amount))) ~> DailyAggs
LookupDimEmployee select(mapColumn(
		employeeID,
		Hours,
		Amount,
		ProjDate,
		facttimestamp,
		EmpID,
		surrogatekey,
		Region,
		Status,
		EmpFunction,
		Level,
		Role,
		StartDate,
		EndDate,
		iscurrent = DimEmployee@iscurrent,
		processtime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> OrigData
DailyAggs, OrigData join(DailyAggs@ProjDate == OrigData@ProjDate
	&& DailyAggs@employeeID == OrigData@employeeID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinAllColumns
LookupDimEmployee derive(employeeID = iif(isNull(employeeID),0,employeeID)) ~> CheckForEarlyFact
JoinAllColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 50,
	mapColumn(
		ProjDate = OrigData@ProjDate,
		employeeID = OrigData@employeeID,
		TotalHours,
		TotalAmount,
		facttimestamp,
		surrogatekey,
		Region,
		Status,
		EmpFunction,
		Level,
		Role,
		processtime
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> writeFactTable

sources.name: Employees1
sources.description: Source employees file, changes every day

sources.name: DimEmployees
sources.description: Current rows in DimEmployees DW table

transformations.name: NullFilter
transformations.description: Filter out NULLs from source file

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		Function as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as string,
		EndDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	wildcardPaths:['SampleData/Emps/today/*.csv']) ~> Employees1
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		surrogatekey as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		EmpFunction as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date,
		iscurrent as integer,
		processtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimEmployees
DimEmployees derive(EmpID = toInteger(EmpID)) ~> TypeConversions
NullFilter derive(EmpID = toInteger(EmpID),
		StartDate = toDate(StartDate,'MM/dd/yyyy'),
		EndDate = toDate(EndDate,'MM/dd/yyyy'),
		processtime = currentTimestamp()) ~> TypeConversionsAndSetAttrs
TypeConversionsAndSetAttrs, TypeConversions lookup(TypeConversionsAndSetAttrs@EmpID == TypeConversions@EmpID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIDs
NormNames split(isNull(iscurrent),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRow, CheckForUpdates)
NameNorm2, TypeConversions exists(NameNorm2@EmpID == TypeConversions@EmpID,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> checkForChanges
ConditionalSplit1@NewRow derive(iscurrent = 1,
		surrogatekey = toString(crc32(EmpID,EmpFunction))) ~> SetAttrsForNew
checkForChanges derive(iscurrent = 0) ~> SetAttrsInactive
checkForChanges derive(iscurrent = 1) ~> SetAttrsUpdate
LookupIDs select(mapColumn(
		EmpID = TypeConversionsAndSetAttrs@EmpID,
		Region = Employees1@Region,
		Status = Employees1@Status,
		Level = Employees1@Level,
		Role = Employees1@Role,
		StartDate = TypeConversionsAndSetAttrs@StartDate,
		EndDate = TypeConversionsAndSetAttrs@EndDate,
		EmpFunction = Function,
		iscurrent,
		processtime = TypeConversionsAndSetAttrs@processtime,
		surrogatekey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> NormNames
SetAttrsInactive select(mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		Status,
		EndDate,
		iscurrent,
		processtime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> InactiveFields
InactiveFields alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
Employees1 filter(!isNull(EmpID)) ~> NullFilter
ConditionalSplit1@CheckForUpdates select(mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		Region,
		Status,
		Level,
		Role,
		StartDate,
		EndDate,
		EmpFunction,
		iscurrent,
		processtime,
		surrogatekey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> NameNorm2
SetAttrsForNew sink(input(
		EmpID as integer,
		surrogatekey as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		EmpFunction as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date,
		iscurrent as integer,
		processtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 50,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> sinkNew
SetAttrsUpdate sink(input(
		EmpID as integer,
		surrogatekey as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		EmpFunction as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date,
		iscurrent as integer,
		processtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 50,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> sinkUpdates
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		EmpID as integer,
		surrogatekey as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		EmpFunction as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date,
		iscurrent as integer,
		processtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['EmpID'],
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 50,
	mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		EndDate,
		iscurrent,
		processtime
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> sinkInactive

parameters{
	PrimaryKey as string ('ID'),
	Columns as string ('Player,Team,Salary')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> GenericInput
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingDimensionTable
AddHashInput, AddHashExisting exists(AddHashInput@id_hash == AddHashExisting@id_hash
	&& AddHashInput@columns_hash == AddHashExisting@columns_hash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NewAndUpdatedRows
GenericInput derive(id_hash = md5(byName($PrimaryKey)),
		columns_hash = md5(byNames(split($Columns,',')))) ~> AddHashInput
FilterForActive derive(id_hash = md5(byNames(split($PrimaryKey,','))),
		columns_hash = md5(byNames(split($Columns,',')))) ~> AddHashExisting
AddHashExisting aggregate(MaxSurrogateKey = max(toInteger(byName('Key')))) ~> GetMaxSurrogateKey
NewAndUpdatedRows keyGenerate(output(Key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> AddKey
AddKey, GetMaxSurrogateKey join(Key == MaxSurrogateKey || true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'right')~> JoinWithMaxSurrogateKey
JoinWithMaxSurrogateKey derive(Key = Key + MaxSurrogateKey,
		Active = 1,
		ActiveStartTime = currentUTC(),
		ActiveEndTime = toTimestamp(toString(null()))) ~> AddDimensionColumns
AddHashExisting, NewAndUpdatedRows exists(AddHashExisting@id_hash == AddHashInput@id_hash,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FilterForUpdatedValues
FilterForUpdatedValues derive(Active = 0,
		ActiveEndTime = currentUTC()) ~> UpdateObsolete
AddDimensionColumns select(mapColumn(
		each(match(!in(['id_hash','columns_hash','MaxSurrogateKey'],name)))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropUnwantedColsInput
MarkAsInsert, DropUnwantedColumns union(byName: true)~> UnionAllData
UpdateObsolete alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> MarkAsUpdate
MarkAsUpdate select(mapColumn(
		each(match(!in(['id_hash','columns_hash','MaxSurrogateKey'],name)))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropUnwantedColumns
DropUnwantedColsInput alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> MarkAsInsert
ExistingDimensionTable filter(toInteger(byName('Active')) == 1) ~> FilterForActive
UnionAllData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:[($PrimaryKey)],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimensionTableSink

transformations.name: OrdenarAnos
transformations.description: Ordenación en base al año numérico

transformations.name: LeerPeliculas
transformations.description: Leemos nuevamente las películas para enlazar al set de datos completo.

transformations.name: EnlacePeliculas
transformations.description: Self-join para tener todas las columnas

transformations.name: SelColumnas
transformations.description: Se elimina una de las columnas año

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MoviesDB
MoviesDB filter(toInteger(year) >= 1910 && toInteger(year) <= 2000 && rlike(genres, 'Comedy'),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FilterYears
FilterYears aggregate(groupBy(year),
	AverageComedyRating = round(avg(toInteger(Rating)),3)) ~> AggregateComedyRatings
SelColumnas sort(asc(toInteger(anno), true),
	caseInsensitive: true,
	partitionLevel: true) ~> OrdenarAnos
MoviesDB select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year_original = year,
		Rating,
		{Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> LeerPeliculas
AggregateComedyRatings, LeerPeliculas join(year == year_original,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> EnlacePeliculas
EnlacePeliculas select(mapColumn(
		id_pelicula = movie,
		titulo = title,
		anno = year_original,
		genero = genres,
		Rating,
		PromedioRatingAnual = AverageComedyRating,
		{Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelColumnas
OrdenarAnos sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['PeliculasOrdenadas_20200622.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MovieSink
